/* Usage */ If we are to take Wikipedia seriously, make sure you understand the purpose of language. By making stuff up, it just makes you look bad. "Semetic" is a race, not "Jewish."
The meaning of "Anti" and "Semite" are clearly defined within the English dictionary. The word Jewish refers to someone's religion. Hebrew is to be "Semite" the original race of the Jewish people.
